email:
Hi John,

Noticed your background leading customer success at Connectbase and your coaching experience developing both teams and players.

One pattern we see with scaling CS leaders: as teams grow, the collective knowledge of how to handle tough customer escalations gets fragmented. Even your best resolvers can't access the proven solutions your team has already developed for similar situations.

This often leads to customers having to explain their issues multiple times and inconsistent resolution quality - especially challenging when experienced team members move on or your operation scales.

Have you explored ways to systematically capture and share your team's collective resolution expertise to prevent this knowledge loss?

Best,  
Almas
